sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react"


const Formulaire = (props) => {
    const [fields, setFields] = useState({
        nom : "",
        prenom : "",
        age : 0,
        sexe : 'f',
        homme : true,
        femme : false,
        check : true
    })
    return (
        <>
            <input type="text" name="nom" value = {fields.nom} />
            <input type="text" name="prenom" value = {fields.prenom} />
            <input type="text" name="age" value = {fields.age} />
            <input type="radio" name="homme" checked = {fields.homme} />
            <input type="radio" name="femme" checked = {fields.femme} />
            <input type="checkbox" name="check" checked = {fields.check} />
            <input type={"button"} value="valider"></input>
        </>
    )
}

export default Formulaire
